interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System
Review Date: 2021/05/17
Store: Keratin Secrets
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'}
Review Text: Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution.
Review Title: Smooth long curls
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Looks neat but small Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) SACE LADY {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Nice pallets! Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Keratin Secrets {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. Smooth long curls
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to appreciate practical home and garden tools, along with personal care items that merge functionality and visual appeal. The recent purchase indicates a particular interest in at-home hair treatments that enhance hair quality.

- **Capacity Preference:** Maintains preference for moderately sized products, as evidenced by previous choices, ensuring they align with functional requirements without excess bulk.

- **Quality Awareness:** The user showcases a discerning approach to product ratings, seeking balance between aesthetics and functionality. Recent purchases reflect satisfaction with quality and usability, critically evaluating packaging and dimensions.

- **Versatility:** Values multipurpose items across home and personal care categories, preferring products that cater to various needs effectively. The latest review indicates an appreciation for comprehensive treatments that improve hair health.

- **Material Preference:** Continues to favor lightweight, practical materials in both home and cosmetic purchases, which is consistent with previous preferences.

- **Review Engagement:** Actively participates in providing feedback, reflecting thorough evaluation of products based on visual appeal, performance, and practicality. Recent engagement suggests a willingness to navigate detailed application processes when quality outcomes are anticipated.

- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** Remains enthusiastic about vibrant colors and high pigmentation in personal care products—evidence of a keen eye for detail regarding aesthetics and performance.

In summary, the user favors practical, aesthetically pleasing items that emphasize quality, usability, and versatility, while maintaining a thoughtful approach to consumer feedback and interactions.
